63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:In the pre-lslamic period of ignorance the people used to bargain with the meat of camels on the principle of Habal-al-Habala which meant the sale of a she-camel that would be born by a she-camel that had not yet been born. The Prophet (ﷺ) forbade them such a transaction

chapter.eng-name: The days of Pre-Islamic Period of Ignorance
